chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
g: R -> R
f: R -> R
b: R
a: R

Goal:
a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous g x) -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous f x) -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x < g x) -> RInt f a b < RInt g a b

Premises:
RInt = fun (V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => iota (is_RInt f a b) : forall V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
continuous = fun (T U : UniformSpace) (f : T -> U) (x : T) => filterlim f (locally x) (locally (f x)) : forall T U : UniformSpace, (T -> U) -> T -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope _]
RInt_gt_0 : forall (g : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> 0 < g x) -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous g x) -> 0 < RInt g a b
RInt_le : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt g a b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RInt f a b <= RInt g a b
RInt_ge_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> 0 <= f x) -> 0 <= RInt f a b
is_RInt_le : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b If Ig : R), a <= b -> is_RInt f a b If -> is_RInt g a b Ig -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> If <= Ig
is_RInt_ge_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b If : R), a <= b -> is_RInt f a b If -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> 0 <= f x) -> 0 <= If
ptd_f2 : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (s : seq R), sorted Rle s -> (forall x y : R, x <= y -> x <= f x y <= y) -> pointed_subdiv (SF_seq_f2 f s)
norm_compat1 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y where ?K : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- AbsRing] ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- NormedModule ?K]
ex_RInt_continuous : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), (forall z : R, Rmin a0 b0 <= z <= Rmax a0 b0 -> continuous f0 z) -> ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 where ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
filterlim_locally : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f0 ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f0 x))) where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type] ?U : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- UniformSpace] ?F : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Filter ?F]
minus_zero_r : forall x : ?G, minus x zero = x where ?G : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- AbelianGroup]
minus_eq_zero : forall x : ?G, minus x x = zero where ?G : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- AbelianGroup]
ball_le : forall (x : ?M) (e1 e2 : R), e1 <= e2 -> forall y : ?M, ball x e1 y -> ball x e2 y where ?M : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- UniformSpace]
filterlim_RInt : forall (f0 : ?U -> R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R) (F : (?U -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter F -> forall (g0 : fct_UniformSpace R ?V) (h : ?U -> ?V), (forall x : ?U, is_RInt (f0 x) a0 b0 (h x)) -> filterlim f0 F (locally g0) -> exists If : ?V, filterlim h F (locally If) /\ is_RInt g0 a0 b0 If where ?U : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type] ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
Rminus_lt_0 : forall a b : R, a < b < -> 0 < b - a
Rminus_le_0 : forall a b : R, a <= b < -> 0 <= b - a
at_right = fun x : R => within (fun u : R => x < u) (locally x) : R -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope function_scope]
Build_Filter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), F (fun _ : T => True) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x)) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q) -> Filter F
sorted_nth : forall (Ord : ?T -> ?T -> Prop) (s : seq ?T), sorted Ord s < -> (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (size s))%nat -> forall x0 : ?T, Ord (nth x0 s i) (nth x0 s (S i))) where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]
unif_part_sort : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), a <= b -> sorted Rle (unif_part a b n)
SF_lx_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), (0 < size P)%nat -> SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = P where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]
ex_RInt_Chasles_2 : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 c : R), a0 <= b0 <= c -> ex_RInt f0 a0 c -> ex_RInt f0 b0 c where ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
ex_RInt_Chasles_1 : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 c : R), a0 <= b0 <= c -> ex_RInt f0 a0 c -> ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 where ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
SF_map_lx : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_map f0 s) = SF_lx s where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]
SF_size_map : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_size (SF_map f0 s) = SF_size s where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]
Rabs_pos_eq : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> Rabs x = x
SF_map_ly : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_ly (SF_map f0 s) = [seq f0 i | i <- SF_ly s] where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]
Rmin_left : forall x y : R, x <= y -> Rmin x y = x
last_unzip1 : forall (x0 : ?S) (y0 : ?T) (s : seq (?S * ?T)), last x0 (unzip1 s) = fst (last (x0, y0) s) where ?S : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type] ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]
Build_ProperFilter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), (forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x) -> Filter F -> ProperFilter F
Rmax_right : forall x y : R, x <= y -> Rmax x y = y
SF_fun_incr : forall (s : SF_seq) (y0 : ?T) (x : R) (Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s)) (Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s)), SF_fun s y0 x = match sorted_dec (SF_lx s) 0 x Hs Hx with | inleft H => nth y0 (SF_ly s) (sval H) | inright _ => nth y0 (SF_ly s) (SF_size s - 1) end where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]
RInt_Chasles : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 c : R), ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 -> ex_RInt f0 b0 c -> plus (RInt f0 a0 b0) (RInt f0 b0 c) = RInt f0 a0 c where ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
sorted_dec : forall (s : seq R) (x0 x : R), sorted Rle s -> head x0 s <= x <= last x0 s -> {i : nat | nth x0 s i <= x < nth x0 s (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size s)%nat} + {nth x0 s (size s - 2) <= x <= nth x0 s (size s - 1)}
ex_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => exists If : V, is_RInt f a b If : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Rle_lt_trans : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r2 < r3 -> r1 < r3
Rlt_le_trans : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, r1 < r2 -> r2 <= r3 -> r1 < r3
SF_size_ly : forall s : SF_seq, size (SF_ly s) = SF_size s where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]
Rplus_le_lt_0_compat : forall r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r1 -> 0 < r2 -> 0 < r1 + r2
Rplus_lt_le_0_compat : forall r1 r2 : R, 0 < r1 -> 0 <= r2 -> 0 < r1 + r2
SF_size_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), SF_size (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = Init.Nat.pred (size P) where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]

```coq
intros g f b a H1 H2 H3 H4.
apply RInt_le; auto.
intros x Hx. apply H3; lra.
intros x Hx. apply H4; lra.
Qed.
```
